attributes.action: Not count carers allowance when means testing of tax credits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I can't work as I look after both my disabled parents, my husband works 30hrs a week so he can help me. We are entitled to tax credit but this is reduced by my carers allowance.
I ask that the carers allowance not be taken in to account when income is assessed. Giving in one hand & taking with the other.
